title: 3 Sports Pools, Ceramic Tile, Built-In Microwave
posting_body: ['Relax & Enjoy Welcome HomeSeacrest Apartment Homes offers stylish 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom floor plans with 13 distinctive layouts.', 'Each apartment home has its own unique characteristics for enhancing comfort, style and exquisite design.', 'An abundant variety of community amenities completes the unique spirit of our community.', 'Unwind at one of our six sun-drenched pools or exercise on our tennis court or three sports pools!', "Our superb location in relation to an array of outdoor parks, including: Fire Wheel Golf Park, Breckinridge Park and Spring Creek Forest Preserve, makes our community an outdoor-enthusiast's dream home!", 'Schedule A Tour', '-Dishwasher', '-Large Closets', '-Resident Activities', '-Playground', '-Spanish Speaking Staff', '-3 Sports Pools', '-Built-In Microwave', '-Washer and Dryer Connections', '-Air Conditioning', '-New Appliance Package', '-Satellite Available', '-Cozy Sunrooms', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
